hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Ali Al-Bariqi said:"A woman came to me to ask a question, and I said to her: 'There is Ibn 'Umar.' So she went after him to ask him, and I went after her to hear what he would say. She said: 'Tell me about silk.' He said: 'The Messenger of Allah [SAW] forbade it

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّشْدِيدِ فِي لُبْسِ الْحَرِيرِ وَأَنَّ مَنْ لَبِسَهُ فِي الدُّنْيَا لَمْ يَلْبَسْهُ فِي الآخِرَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Stern Warning Against Wearing Silk, and That Whoever Wears it in This World Will Not Wear it in the Hereafter
